name: Gouki The Tyrant Ogre
effectText:
1 "Gouki" Link Monster + 1 Warrior, Dinosaur, or Cyberse monster
If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can target cards on the field up to the total Link Rating of "Gouki" monsters used as this card's material (if you used a Link-3 or higher monster, neither player can activate those targeted cards or their effects in response to this effect's activation); destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Gouki The Tyrant Ogre" once per turn.
